documentation.short: Connects the DSR core to the message engine.
documentation.long:
Connects the DSR core to the message engine.
@author Ryan Stinnett

documentation.short:
Modified sender for single destination multihop packets of created
by a PacketEngine processor for a given link layer AM type.
Connects to SinglePacketP to supporting modules.
documentation.long:
Connects to SinglePacketP to supporting modules.
@author Ryan Stinnett

documentation.short: The basic chip-independent TOSSIM Active Message layer for radio chips that do not have simulation support.

Multihop protocols instantiate this component to connect the packet
engine to the AM layer for a given link layer AM type.
documentation.long:
Multihop protocols instantiate this component to connect the packet
engine to the AM layer for a given link layer AM type. The Packet
interface used by this component should be provided by the protocol.
Similarly, the SubPacket interface provided by this component should
be used by the protocol to complete the chain of Packet interfaces.
@author Ryan Stinnett

documentation.short:
Connects a component that processes packets of a given AM type to the
packet engine.
Bundles the components which route and process DSR.
documentation.long:
Bundles the components which route and process DSR.
@author Ryan Stinnett

documentation.short:
Connects a component that processes packets of a given AM type to the
packet engine.
